channel.title: [TUT]Web design for your private server
channel.description:
[b]The Almost~ 1[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,116178.0.html]Web design for your Private server![/url] [b]step 1:[/b]first off you need a website, a good example of a free webhoster is [url=http://www.freehostia.com]Freehostia[/url]. [b]step 2:[/b]now, do not select a template unless you really want one! now if you haven't added a template, go to site manager and edit index! put this code inside! [code] RuneScape - the massive online adventure game by Jagex Ltd

There are currently 85037 people playing!
RuneScape
  • Create a free account (New user)
  • Play RuneScape (Existing user)
  • View in-game screenshots
  • Language > English | German
Knowledge Base
  • Knowledge Base Home
  • Getting started
  • Rules
  • Manual
  • QuestHelp
  • Parents' Guide
  • Safety & Security
  • Customer Support
  • Comment on our service
  • Report a bug/fault
Latest Poll
Favourite skills of all time!
  • Vote in this poll (Free/Member)
  • Poll Home
Website Features
  • World map
  • Hiscores
  • Forums
  • Stories and Letters
  • Downloads
  • Jagex Shop
Membership
  • Membership Benefits
  • Start a new subscription
  • Extend an existing subscription
  • Cancel an existing subscription
Account Management
  • Read your messages from Jagex
  • Change your password
  • Set new recovery questions
  • Cancel recovery questions
Account Recovery
  • Recover a lost password
  • Recover a locked account
  • Track a recovery request
  • Appeal an Offence/Ban
Player Moderators
  • Visit the player moderator centre
  • Find out about player mods

RuneScape Classic
  • RuneScape Classic

Create a free account
(New user)
Play RuneScape
(Existing user)
 
02-Apr-2007New Poll System
The poll system has had an overhaul, making it much more suitable for finding out your opinions, likes and dislikes. Multiple questions, multiple choice answers and even a regular Player-submitted poll week are just a few of the changes made...
Read more...
02-Apr-2007Easter Antics
'Tis the season to eat chocolate, and RuneScape's own Easter Bunny has had a slight mishap with his chocolate order. Oh, and don't forget: even non-members can do the Easter Event!
Read more...
02-Apr-2007Behind the Scenes - April
Once a year he comes to RuneScape and causes havoc wherever he treads. Some say he is a menace, some say he is misunderstood. Some say he is, in fact, some ancient spirit cursed to spend eternity causing the mundane to be, well, a bit odd really. Whatever others think, we know he is just the Easter Bunny. Read on to see what he has planned for you this year, plus three other exciting updates for you to enjoy in April.
Read more...
29-Mar-2007Rule 2 Update
In our continuing efforts to make RuneScape a nicer place to be, we've just made a slight modification to Rule 2.
Read more...
27-Mar-2007What Lies Below
This week sees the release of What Lies Below, a quest that leads you through some of the darker history of Varrock, as well as helping you out with your Runecrafting.
Read more...
Browse the news archives
This website and its contents are copyright © 1999 - 2007 Jagex Ltd.
Use of this website is subject to our Terms+Conditions and Privacy policy
[/code] [b]step 3:[/b]ok, now you got to change all the 'runescape' to your server's name next you need to change [code]This website and its contents are copyright © 1999 - 2007 Jagex Ltd.
Use of this website is subject to our Terms+Conditions[/code] to what you want at the bottom of you website. [b]step 4:[/b]now where it says [code]
[/code] there will be some news change the title of the news and the news to your server's news. [b]step 5:[/b]next find all the [code]
Read more...
[/code] and delete those. all they do is take you to runescape's read more section of that article and also delete [code]
Browse the news archives
[/code] [b]step 6:[/b]at the top change the [code]http://www.runescape.com/img/title2/rslogo3.gif[/code] that is in [code]
[/code] th your banner's url and also change [code]RuneScape - the massive online adventure game by Jagex Ltd[/code]to [code]yourserver'sname - a little extra bit about your server[/code] [b]step 7:[/b]ow delete, if you don't it just makes more work [code]

[/code] [b]step 8:[/b]you will see lots of these [code]
RuneScape
  • Create a free account (New user)
  • Play RuneScape (Existing user)
  • View in-game screenshots
  • Language > English | German
Knowledge Base
    [/code]you will need to change the [code]
  • Play RuneScape (Existing user)
  • View in-game screenshots
    • [/code]'s the [code]href=screenshots[/code] or [code]href=detail.ws[/code] is the website's link you want to go to and the [code]>play runescape<[/code] is what you want it to say. [b]step 9:[/b]finally, you need to save it all and get a domain for your website go to [url=http://www.freedomain.co.nr]a domain provider[/url] and register and get your domain! [b]credits:[/b]100% The Almost it should look like [url=http://www.hotscape.co.nr]this[/url] Please tell me if i missed something!

item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

The Almost:

dude u need to stop being jerks i happen to like freewebs thats why i said it was a good example its my opinion not yours i didnt say it was a fact

Wow you’re fucking retarded. For one thing, Freewebs IS shit. And when you come to this forum, the people who have established their intelligence, their opinion matters more than yours. Niall can easily edit your post to change it from Freewebs to something else. So it doesn’t matter what opinion you have, no one cares.

Second, you bumped a year old topic to call them jerks. That’s just stupid.

Read full topic

put all the files in one zip, click the icon and voila, they’re all extracted xD[/quote]
